T-161631F4.title: Implement Progress Bar UI Component
T-161631F4.description: Create a visually appealing green progress bar component for the Chrome extension
T-161631F4.technical_details: Implement HTML/CSS/JavaScript progress bar with smooth animations, percentage display, and status messages. Should integrate with existing extension UI and show during automation operations.

T-4A846274.title: Integrate Progress Bar with Extension Backend
T-4A846274.description: Connect progress bar component with extension automation logic to track operation progress
T-4A846274.technical_details: Add progress tracking to automation scripts, implement event system for progress updates, handle different operation types (LinkedIn automation, data processing, etc.)

T-8A0CC702.title: Add Progress Bar State Management
T-8A0CC702.description: Implement state management for progress bar visibility, status messages, and progress values
T-8A0CC702.technical_details: Create state management system using extension storage API, handle progress bar show/hide logic, manage status text updates, persist progress state across page reloads

T-F720DB24.title: Style Progress Bar Component
T-F720DB24.description: Design and implement CSS styling for attractive green progress bar with animations
T-F720DB24.technical_details: Create CSS for progress bar container, animated fill bar, percentage text, status messages, responsive design for different screen sizes, smooth transitions and hover effects

T-CD3EE0BA.title: Write Tests for Progress Bar Functionality
T-CD3EE0BA.description: Create comprehensive test suite for progress bar component and integration
T-CD3EE0BA.technical_details: Write unit tests for progress bar component, integration tests for backend communication, UI tests for visual rendering, end-to-end tests for complete user workflows
